body:
The NASDAQ 100 Pre-Market Indicator is up 40.37 to 5,157.14. The total Pre-Market volume is currently 10,141,339 shares traded. 

 

 The following are the most active stocks for the pre-market session : 

 

 Apple Inc. ( AAPL ) is +5.69 at $127.04, with 1,935,967 shares traded. Over the last four weeks they have had 3 up revisions for the earnings forecast, for the fiscal quarter ending Sep 2017. The consensus EPS forecast is $1.85. As reported by Zacks, the current mean recommendation for AAPL is in the "buy range". 

 

 Sanchez Energy Corporation ( SN ) is -0.24 at $13.02, with 1,487,937 shares traded. SN's current last sale is 81.38% of the target price of $16. 

 

 China Unicom (Hong Kong) Ltd ( CHU ) is -0.0512 at $11.92, with 750,000 shares traded. CHU's current last sale is 83.23% of the target price of $14.32. 

 

 Bank of America Corporation ( BAC ) is +0.29 at $22.93, with 709,100 shares traded. Over the last four weeks they have had 5 up revisions for the earnings forecast, for the fiscal quarter ending Mar 2017. The consensus EPS forecast is $0.35. As reported by Zacks, the current mean recommendation for BAC is in the "buy range". 

 

 Univar Inc. ( UNVR ) is -0.82 at $29.00, with 676,849 shares traded. UNVR's current last sale is 111.54% of the target price of $26. 

 

 Synergy Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ( SGYP ) is -0.91 at $6.16, with 562,705 shares traded., following a 52-week high recorded in prior regular session. 

 

 LifeLock, Inc. ( LOCK ) is unchanged at $23.96, with 488,794 shares traded.LOCK is scheduled to provide an earnings report on 2/8/2017, for the fiscal quarter ending Dec2016. The consensus earnings per share forecast is 0.4 per share, which represents a 26 percent increase over the EPS one Year Ago 

 

 VALE S.A. ( VALE ) is +0.31 at $10.49, with 475,431 shares traded. VALE's current last sale is 114.96% of the target price of $9.125. 

 

 VelocityShares Daily 2x VIX Short Term ETN ( TVIX ) is -0.21 at $5.23, with 318,724 shares traded. This represents a 1.36% increase from its 52 Week Low. 

 

 Facebook, Inc. ( FB ) is +1.52 at $131.84, with 286,088 shares traded. Over the last four weeks they have had 5 up revisions for the earnings forecast, for the fiscal quarter ending Dec 2016. The consensus EPS forecast is $1.13. RTT News Reports: Facebook Q4 16 Earnings Conference Call At 5:00 PM ET 

 

 First Hawaiian, Inc. ( FHB ) is -0.44 at $32.55, with 191,130 shares traded. FHB's current last sale is 95.74% of the target price of $34. 

 

 VelocityShares Daily Inverse VIX Short Term ETN ( XIV ) is +1.12 at $61.87, with 133,157 shares traded. This represents a 302.8% increase from its 52 Week Low.
title: Pre-Market Most Active for Feb 1, 2017 : AAPL, SN, CHU, BAC, UNVR, SGYP, LOCK, VALE, TVIX, FB, FHB, XIV
